attributes.action: Save the job of our fearless leader Mr David Hamilton who works at Corus on Teesside
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are members of T.D.D.H.N.S.H.S (The David Diddy Hamilton Nice Shaped Head Society) and we demand that Gordon Brown and the defunct government make a priority of saving the job of our said leader, Mr David Hamilton
Dave is facing redundancy at Vesuvius which is an organisation at the doomed Corus plant in Teesside. We suggest that Gordon saves his job by nationalising Corus with a huge buy out. 
If these demands are not met we shall have no other option than to create a revolution and overthrow the government.

PS There are also another 2999 jobs at risk here!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
